SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.network.RMI

Class RemoteObjectServer

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.network.RMI.RemoteObjectServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteInterfaceServer, Serializable, Remote
public class RemoteObjectServer extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RemoteInterfaceServer
RemoteObjectServer class is the concrete implementation of the RemoteInterfaceServer for RMI. The interface is logged in the RMI registry and the client can call methods on it. This class contains te implementations for those methods.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • RemoteObjectServer

      protected RemoteObjectServer() throws RemoteException
      Creates and exports a new UnicastRemoteObject object using the particular supplied port and socket factories.

      Either socket factory may be null, in which case the corresponding client or server socket creation method of ... is used instead.

      Throws:
      RemoteException - if failed to export object
      Since:
      1.2

      Parameters:
